body: Would you help to fix the TODO in line 729, to let `TransposeTensor` return a `Status` instead? This also helps if the output tensor is `nullptr`, and we can just return an error and do `TF_RETURN_IF_ERROR(TransposeTensor(...))` here.
body_html: Would you help to fix the TODO in line 729, to let TransposeTensor return a Status instead? This also helps if the output tensor is nullptr, and we can just return an error and do TF_RETURN_IF_ERROR(TransposeTensor(...)) here.
body_text: Would you help to fix the TODO in line 729, to let TransposeTensor return a Status instead? This also helps if the output tensor is nullptr, and we can just return an error and do TF_RETURN_IF_ERROR(TransposeTensor(...)) here.
